messages.text: I can help with that! What's the topic of your demo video and who is the audience?

Topic	A demo video showcasing video generation capabilities, highlighting key features like AI avatars, script generation, and B-roll integration.
Audience	General audience interested in AI video tools, such as content creators and marketers.
Music Theme	Upbeat and modern electronic music to convey innovation and energy.
Video Length	Roughly 15 seconds (short demo format).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, covering an overview of video generation features in a concise, engaging manner.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	One professional-looking avatar: a young adult female with a friendly, approachable style.
Voice	Adult female voice with a neutral American accent, clear and enthusiastic.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	AI illustrations to demonstrate concepts like avatar creation and video editing features.
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
